thi-ap21:28.2: balimajjhāsayo → khalitajjhāsayo (bj) | baliṃ paccāharaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mālapaccāhataṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap21:33.3: Na ca dāni puno atthi → taṃ vandāmi puna natthi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap21:36.3: Migaṃ uṇṇā yathā evaṃ → cittapuṇṇāyatāneva (sya1ed, sya2ed) | migaṃ puṇṇāyateneva (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap21:48.4: īdisaṃ cintayiṃ → iti saṃcintayiṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | iti sañcintayiṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
